title: A Norwich Taxi Rank:  Episode 106
content:encoded:
Late at night, many of us congregate at the local taxi rank waiting for that lift home. The mood is often light-hearted as people chat and laugh with others across the whole cross-section of society. 

But sometimes, often fuelled by drink or drugs, the mood turns sour and can lead to aggressive and violent behaviour. This was the case at a taxi rank in Norwich, Norfolk in 2008. 

And what happened next is covered in this episode of the UK True Crime Weekly Podcast.
